title.narrative: SWIFT IV Task Order for Nigeria

description.narrative: Creative supports U.S. government initiatives that assist countries-in-transition with rapid-response programs that promote democracy, strengthen government institutions and help stabilize diverse communities through the Support Which Implements Fast Transition IV (SWIFT IV) Indefinite Quantity Contract.
